Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Boomiyengum Kudiyirukkira Sagala Janaththaarukkum Jaadhiyaarukkum Baashaikkaararukkum Ezhudhugiradhu Ennavendraal: Ungalukku Samaadhaanam Perugakkadavadhu.
2 unnadhamaana Dhevan Ennidaththil Seydha Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum Prasiththappaduththuvadhu Enakku Nanmaiyaaik Kandadhu.

3 avarudaiya Adaiyaalangal Evvalavu Magaththuvamum, Avarudaiya Arpudhangal Evvalavu Vallamaiyumaayirukkiradhu; Avarudaiya Raajyam Niththiya Raajyam; Avarudaiya Aalugai Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Nirkum.
4 nebugaadhnechchaaraagiya Naan Enveettile Savukkiyamullavanaayirundhu En Aramanaiyile Vaazhndhukondirundhen.
5 naan Oru Soppanaththaik Kanden; Adhu Enakkuth Thigilai Undaakkitru; En Padukkaiyinmel Enakkul Undaana Ninaivugalum, En Thalaiyil Thondrina Dharisanangalum Ennaik Kalangappannitru.
6 aagaiyaal Soppanaththin Arththaththai Enakkuth Therivikkiradharkaaga Baabilonin Gnaanigalaiyellaam Ennidaththil Konduvarumpadi Kattalaiyitten.

7 appozhudhu Saasthirigalum, Josiyarum, Kaldheyarum, Kurisollugiravargalum Ennidaththile Vandhaargal; Soppanaththai Naan Avargalukku Sonnaalum Adhin Arththaththai Enakkuth Therivikkamaattaamarponaargal.

8 kadaisiyile En Dhevanudaiya Naamaththinpadiye Peldheshaadhsaar Ennum Peyaridappattu, Parisuththa Dhevargalin Aaviyaiyudaiya Dhaaniyel Ennidaththil Konduvarappattaan; Avanidaththil Naan Soppanaththai Vivariththu Sonnadhaavadhu:

9 saasthirigalin Adhipadhiyaagiya Peldheshaadhsaare, Parisuththa Dhevargaludaiya Aavi Unakkul Irukkiradhendrum, Endha Maraiporulaiyum Arivadhu Unakku Aridhallavendrum Naan Ariven; Naan Kanda En Soppanaththin Dharisanangalaiyum Adhin Arththaththaiyum Sollu.
10 naan Paduththirundhapodhu En Thalaiyil Thondrina Dharisanangal Ennavendraal: Idho, Dhesaththin Maththiyile Migavum Uyaramaana Oru Virutchaththaik Kanden.
11 andha Virutcham Valarndhu Balaththu, Dhesaththin Ellai Pariyandhamum Kaanappadaththakkadhaaga Adhin Uyaram Vaanapariyandham Ettinadhu.

12 adhin Ilaigal Nerththiyum, Adhin Kani Migudhiyumaayirundhadhu; Ellaa Jeevanukkum Adhil Aagaaram Undaayirundhadhu; Adhinkeezhe Veliyin Mirugangal Nizhalukku Odhunginadhu; Adhin Koppugalil Aagaayaththup Patchigal Thaabariththu Sagala Praanigalum Adhinaal Poshikkappattadhu.
13 naan Paduththirukkaiyil En Thalaiyil Thondrina Dharisanangalaik Kaanumpodhu, Kaavalaalanaagiya Parisuththavaan Oruvan Vaanaththilirundhu Irangakkanden.

14 avan Uraththa Saththamittu: Indhavirutchaththai Vetti, Idhin Koppugalaith Thariththuppodungal; Idhin Laigalai Udhirththu, Idhin Kanigalai Sidharadiyungal; Idhin Keezhulla Mirugangalum Idhin Koppugalilulla Patchigalum Poividattum.

15 aanaalum Idhin Vergalaagiya Adimaram Boomiyil Irukkattum; Irumbum Vengalamumaana Vilangu Idappattu, Veliyin Pasumpullile Thangi, Aagaayaththup Paniyile Nanaivadhaaga; Mirugangalode Boomiyin Poondile Avanukkup Pangu Irukkakkadavadhu.
16 avanudaiya Irudhayam Manusha Irudhayamaayiraamal Maarumpadi, Miruga Irudhayam Avanukkuk Kodukkappadakkadavadhu; Ippadiyirukkira Avanmel Ezhu Kaalangal Kadandhupogavendum.

17 unnadhamaanavar Manusharudaiya Raajyaththil Aalugaiseydhu Thamakku Siththamaanavanukku Adhaik Koduththu, Manusharil Thaazhndhavanaiyum Adhinmel Adhigaariyaakkugiraar Endru Narajeevangal Ariyumpadikkuk Kaavalaalarin Theerppinaal Indhak Kaariyamum Parisuththavaangalin Mozhiyinaal Indha Visaaranaiyum Theermaanikkappattadhu Endraan.

18 nebugaadhnechchaar Ennum Raajaavaagiya Naan Kanda Soppanam Idhuve: Ippodhu Peldheshaadhsaare, Nee Idhin Arththaththai Sollu; En Raajyaththilulla Gnaanigal Ellaaraalum Idhin Arththaththai Enakkuth Therivikkak Koodaamarpoyitru; Neeyo Idhaith Therivikkaththakkavan; Parisuththa Dhevargaludaiya Aavi Unakkul Irukkiradhe Endraan.

19 appozhudhu Peldheshaadhsaarennum Peyarulla Dhaaniyel Oru Naazhigaimattum Thigaiththu Sindhiththuk Kalanginaan. Raajaa Avanai Nokki: Peldheshaadhsaare, Soppanamum Adhin Arththamum Unnaik Kalangappannavendiyadhillai Endraan; Appozhudhu Peldheshaadhsaar Pradhiyuththaramaaga: En Aandavane, Andha Soppanam Ummudaiya Pagaivaridaththilum. Adhin Arththam Ummudaiya Saththurukkalidaththilum Palikkakkadavadhu.
20 neer Kanda Virutcham Valarndhu Balaththu, Vaanaththin Ellaipariyandham Kaanappadaththakkadhaaga Adhin Uyaram Vaanapariyandham Ettinadhu.

21 adhin Ilaigal Nerththiyum, Adhinkani Migudhiyumaayirundhadhu; Ellaa Jeevanukkum Adhil Aagaaram Undaayirundhadhu; Adhinkeezhe Veliyin Mirugangal Thanginadhu, Adhin Koppugalil Aagaayaththuppatchigal Thaabariththadhu.
22 adhu Periyavarum Balaththavarumaayirukkira Raajaavaagiya Neerdhaame; Umadhu Magaththuvam Perugi Vaanapariyandhamum, Umadhu Karththaththuvam Boomiyin Ellaipariyandhamum Ettiyirukkiradhu.

23 indha Virutchaththai Vetti, Idhai Azhiththuppodungal; Aanaalum Idhin Vergalaagiya Adimaram Tharaiyil Irukkattumendrum, Irumbum Vengalamumaana Vilangu Idappattu, Veliyin Pasumpullile Thangi, Aagaayaththup Paniyile Nanaivadhaaga; Ezhu Kaalangal Avanmel Kadandhupogumattum Mirugangalode Avanudaiya Pangu Irukkakkadavadhendrum, Vaanaththilirundhu Irangi Sonna Parisuththa Kaavalaalanai Raajaavaagiya Neer Kandeere.

24 raajaave, Adhin Arththamum Raajaavaagiya En Aandavanperil Vandha Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Theermaanamum Ennavendraal: Manusharinindru Neer Thallividappaduveer; Veliyin Mirugangalode Sanjarippeer; Maadugalaippolap Pullaimeyndhu, Aagaayaththup Paniyile Nanaiveer.
25 unnadhamaanavar Manusharudaiya Raajyaththil Aalugaiseydhu, Thamakku Siththamaayirukkiravanukku Adhaikkodukkiraar Enbadhai Neer Arindhukollumattum Ezhu Kaalangal Ummudaiyaperil Kadandhupogavendum.
26 aanaalum Virutchaththin Vergalaagiya Adimaram Tharaiyil Irukkattum Endru Sollappattadhu Ennavendraal: Neer Parama Adhigaaraththai Arindhapin, Raajyam Umakku Nilainirkum.

27 aagaiyaal Raajaave, Naan Sollum Aalosanaiyai Neer Angeegariththukkondu Needhiyai Seydhu Umadhu Paavangalaiyum, Sirumaiyaanavargalukku Irangi Umadhu Akkiramangalaiyum Agatrividum; Appozhudhu Ummudaiya Vaazhvu Neediththirukkalaam Endraan.
28 idhellaam Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarinmel Vandhadhu.
29 pannirandu Maadham Sendrapinbu, Raajaa Baabilon Raajyaththin Aramanaimel Ulaavikkondirukkumpodhu:
30 idhu En Vallamaiyin Paraakkiramaththinaal, En Magimaippradhaabaththukkendru, Raajyaththukku Aramanaiyaaga Naan Kattina Magaa Baabilon Allavaa Endru Sonnaan.
31 indha Vaarththai Raajaavin Vaayil Irukkumpodhe, Vaanaththilirundhu Oru Saththam Undaagi: Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaare, Raajyabaaram Unnaivittu Neengitru.

32 manusharinindru Thallappaduvaai; Veliyin Mirugangalode Sanjarippaai; Maadugalaippol Pullai Meyvaai; Ippadiye Unnadhamaavar Manusharudaiya Raajyaththil Aalugaiseydhu, Thamakku Siththamaayirukkiravanukku Adhaik Kodukkiraarenbadhai Nee Arindhukollumattum Ezhu Kaalangal Unmel Kadandhupogum Endru Unakku Sollappadugiradhu Endru Vilambinadhu.

33 annerame Indha Vaarththai Nebugaadhnechchaaridaththil Niraiveritru; Avan Manusharinindru Thallappattu, Maadugalaippol Pullai Meyndhaan; Avanudaiya Thalaimayir Kazhugugaludaiya Iragugalaippolavum, Avanudaiya Nagangal Patchigaludaiya Nagangalaippolavum Valarumattum Avan Sareeram Aagaayaththup Paniyile Nanaindhadhu.

34 andha Naatkal Sendrapinbu, Nebugaadhnechchaaraagiya Naan En Kangalai Vaanaththukku Ereduththen; En Buththi Enakkuth Thirumbi Vandhadhu; Appozhudhu Naan Unnadhamaanavarai Sthoththiriththu, Endrendraikkum Jeeviththirukkiravaraip Pugazhndhu Magimaippaduththinen; Avarudaiya Karththaththuvame Niththiya Karththaththuvam, Avarudaiya Raajyame Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Nirkum.

35 boomiyin Kudigal Ellaam Ondrumillaiyendru Ennappadugiraargal; Avar Thamadhu Siththaththinpadiye Vaanaththin Senaiyaiyum Boomiyin Kudigalaiyum Nadaththugiraar, Avarudaiya Kaiyaith Thaduththu, Avarai Nokki: Enna Seygireerendru Sollaththakkavan Oruvanum Illai Endren.

36 avvelaiyil En Buththi Enakkuth Thirumbivandhadhu; En Raajyabaaraththin Menmaikkaaga En Magimaiyum En Mugakkalaiyum Enakkuth Thirumbivandhadhu, En Mandhirimaarum En Prabukkalum Ennaith Thedivandhaargal; En Raajyaththile Sthirappaduththappatten; Adhiga Magaththuvamum Enakkuk Kidaiththadhu.

37 aagaiyaal Nebugaadhnechchaaraagiya Naan Paralogaththin Raajaavaip Pugazhndhu, Uyarththi, Magimaippaduththugiren; Avarudaiya Kiriyaigalellaam Saththiyamum, Avarudaiya Vazhigal Nyaayamumaanavaigal; Agandhaiyaai Nadakkiravargalaith Thaazhththa Avaraale Aagum Endru Ezhudhinaan.
